    Introduction

Introduction

Source: vignettes/introduction.Rmd
introduction.Rmd

When creating R markdown websites, I often find myself wanting to organise content into a nice-looking grid of links. For example, in a recent project I wanted something like this:

Starting R markdown

An introduction to R markdown. The target audience is a novice R user with no previous experience with markdown.

Starting ggplot2

An introduction to ggplot2. The target audience is a novice user with no previous experience with R or ggplot2.

Starting programming

This is primarily a tutorial on making generative art in R, but in doing so introduces core programming constructs and data structures. It is assumed the user has some previous experience with ggplot2.

The goal of bs4cards is to his task a little easier inside an R markdown document or website.

Enabling bootstrap 4

The bs4cards package takes its name from the “cards” system introduced in bootstrap version 4, and the package does not work for R markdown documents that rely on bootstrap version 3. To ensure that you are using bootstrap 4, you need to edit the YAML header for your document to specify which version of bootstrap you want to use. For example, here is the relevant section of YAML you might use in a simple R markdown site

output:
  html_document:
    theme:
      version: 4

This overrides the R markdown defaults to ensure that the output is built using boostrap 4.5 rather than an older version (boostrap 3.4) that doesn’t support cards.

To enable bootstrap 4 in a pkgdown site (such as this one), edit the _pkgdown.yml file to include the following

template:
  bootstrap: 4

(You may need to update to the development version of pkgdown to make this work!)

Basic cards

library(bs4cards)
card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute."
)
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image below is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.",
  image_align = "bottom"
)
My First Card

The image below is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

Card grids

kitty <- function( ...) {
  card(
    title = "A kitten card",
    image = sample_kitten(),
    text = sample_lorem(),
    ...
  )
}

kitty_list <- list(kitty(), kitty(), kitty(), 
                   kitty(), kitty(), kitty())

card_group(kitty_list)
A kitten card

Eodem modo is enim tibi nemo dabit, quod, expetendum sit, id esse laudabile. Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Eam si varietatem diceres, intellegerem, ut etiam non dicente te intellego;

A kitten card

Longum est enim ad omnia respondere, quae a te dicta sunt. An me, inquam, nisi te audire vellem, censes haec dicturum fuisse? Quae fere omnia appellantur uno ingenii nomine, easque virtutes qui habent, ingeniosi vocantur.

A kitten card

Si alia sentit, inquam, alia loquitur, numquam intellegam quid sentiat; Ita ne hoc quidem modo paria peccata sunt. Nobis aliter videtur, recte secusne, postea;

A kitten card

Qui ita affectus, beatum esse numquam probabis; Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Equidem e Cn. Duo Reges: constructio interrete.

A kitten card

Tria genera bonorum; At quicum ioca seria, ut dicitur, quicum arcana, quicum occulta omnia? Quasi vero, inquit, perpetua oratio rhetorum solum, non etiam philosophorum sit. Quorum sine causa fieri nihil putandum est.

A kitten card

Cur ipse Pythagoras et Aegyptum lustravit et Persarum magos adiit? Scaevola tribunus plebis ferret ad plebem vellentne de ea re quaeri. Beatus sibi videtur esse moriens.

Headers and footers

list(kitty(footer = "Kitten A"), 
     kitty(footer = "Kitten B"), 
     kitty(footer = "Kitten C")) %>% 
  card_group()
A kitten card

Et certamen honestum et disputatio splendida! Tria genera bonorum; At quicum ioca seria, ut dicitur, quicum arcana, quicum occulta omnia? Vos autem cum perspicuis dubia debeatis illustrare, dubiis perspicua conamini tollere.

Kitten A
A kitten card

Et certamen honestum et disputatio splendida! Scaevola tribunus plebis ferret ad plebem vellentne de ea re quaeri. Nobis aliter videtur, recte secusne, postea;

Kitten B
A kitten card

Quasi vero, inquit, perpetua oratio rhetorum solum, non etiam philosophorum sit. Nam cui proposito sit conservatio sui, necesse est huic partes quoque sui caras suo genere laudabiles. Gracchum patrem non beatiorem fuisse quam fillum, cum alter stabilire rem publicam studuerit, alter evertere.

Kitten C
list(kitty(header = "Kitten A"), 
     kitty(header = "Kitten B"), 
     kitty(header = "Kitten C")) %>% 
  card_group()
Kitten A
A kitten card

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quae fere omnia appellantur uno ingenii nomine, easque virtutes qui habent, ingeniosi vocantur. Sed erat aequius Triarium aliquid de dissensione nostra iudicare.

Kitten B
A kitten card

Eaedem res maneant alio modo. Quid est, quod ab ea absolvi et perfici debeat? Haec para/doca illi, nos admirabilia dicamus.

Kitten C
A kitten card

Ergo ita: non posse honeste vivi, nisi honeste vivatur? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Sed emolumenta communia esse dicuntur, recte autem facta et peccata non habentur communia.

Customising card width

card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.",
  width = bs_col(medium = 4) 
)
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card( title = "My First Card", image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200", text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.", width = bs_col(medium = 6) )
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card( title = "My First Card", image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200", text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.", width = bs_col(large = 6) )
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.
